sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Todo = () => { function cards() { const inp= document.getElementById("inputtext") const i=inp.value let card=document.createElement("div") card.setAttribute("class","card") card.setAttribute("id","card_div") document.getElementById("cards").appendChild(card) let card_header=document.createElement("div") card_header.setAttribute("class","card-header") card_header.setAttribute("id","card_head") card.appendChild(card_header) let header=document.createElement("h4") header.innerText="User" card_header.appendChild(header) let body=document.createElement("div") body.setAttribute("class","card-body") body.setAttribute("id","card_body") card.appendChild(body) let body_div=document.createElement("div") let checkbox=document.createElement("input") checkbox.setAttribute("class","form-check-input me-3") checkbox.setAttribute("id","id_checkbox") checkbox.setAttribute("type","checkbox") body_div.appendChild(checkbox) let para=document.createElement("p") para.setAttribute("class","card-text me-5") para.setAttribute("id","paratext") para.innerHTML=i body.appendChild(para) let del=document.createElement("button") del.setAttribute("class","btn btn-danger float-right mt-0") del.setAttribute("id","delete_button") del.innerText="Delete" body.appendChild(del) } return ( <>

My Day

Lists

) } export default Todo
